text: Jab aap enhen dekh len to inn kay jism aap ko khushnuma maloom hon yeh jab baaten kerney lagen to aap inn ki baaton per (apna) kaan lagayen goya kay yeh lakriyan hain deewar kay shaharay lagee huin her (sakht) aawaz ko apney khilaf samajhtay hain yehi haqeeqi dushman hain inn say bacho Allah enhen ghaarat keray kahan say phiray jatay hain
